message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.NE 

Reasoning: The paper is focused on Natural Language Processing (NLP) and specifically on the word embedding algorithm word2vec. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also discusses the use of machine learning techniques to capture relational similarity in word embeddings, which suggests that it could also be relevant to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of text corpora to generate input for word2vec, which could be relevant to cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper discusses the representation of relations in continuous space, which could be relevant to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
